related-activity.ref: 0510/A0/05/404 OCM 4. EVERY CHILD HAS AN EQUAL CHANCE IN LIFE

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The agenda of the corporate sector and media promotes and advocates for children’s rights at national- and sub-national level in the four departments receiving UNICEF support.

description.narrative: UNICEF increased public awareness and strengthened social mobilization and its partnerships to promote participation and position children's rights at the center of the development agenda. An advocacy strategy was implemented during the national elections aimed at promoting public policies for children and adolescents; the involvement of the private sector in the promotion of children's rights was actively promoted during this process. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
